dc.title: Health Care
dc.description: President Commends House Action on Patients' Bill of Rights Remarks by the President at Inova Fair Oaks Hospital Remarks by the President to Specialty Doctors and Patients President Commends Bipartisan Efforts on Patients' Bill of Rights U. Department of Health and Human Services Read the President's Speech The President believes that we should trust patients, working with health care professionals, to decide which treatment is best for them.
